data.description:
Welcome potential assassins!

Armed with your weapons you must complete your objectives completely undetected in order to succeed. Sneak, climb, evade your enemy, or kill at your own risk. Use a variety of weapons including daggers, axes, shields and hidden blades to stab, slash and trip up your enemies. Some weapons are provided, others you'll have to find, steal or kill for. Enemy awareness is heightened as the difficulty level rises! Hide the bodies.



Out of the Shadows is a stealth based assassin game currently in early access. There are 3 unique maps with various difficulties, each one has it's own challenges and objectives. There are currently 2 modes: Objective (Complete objectives as quickly as possible) and Overkill (Kill everything as quickly as possible). Not a stealth fan? Run, jump & climb around the maps without any reaction from enemies in Sandbox mode!

This game is in Early Access, to get the latest updates on the development, and give your feedback for potential inclusion in the game - join our Discord.

changelog.change_log: - Fix bug in Village Overkill mode

- New map
- New weapons - mace, highland sword, executioners axe, smaller sword
- New enemies - castle lord (assassination target), prison guards / executioners, armoured guard
- Guards carry door keys in the new map
- Hidden blades fix

- Reimplemented hidden blade system
- Door collisions no longer do damage
- Minor performance improvements
- Bug fixes

- New Weapon
- Crouch toggle
- Randomized spawn location on Fort
- Randomized key spawn location on Fort and Village
- You must now exit the fort to succeed (objective mode only)
- Minor tweaks and improvements to player movement
- Bug fixes

Fix enemy helmet colliders moving while being held
Fix scroll looting objective on the village level
Minor tweaks to lighting on fort level

- Fixed issue with looting objective on Village map
- Added disabling of turning with the stick

- Easier to pull yourself up on ledges
- Weapons deal *slightly* more damage
- Easy / Medium difficulty is *slightly* reduced by giving the user a tiny bit longer to hide
- Various minor bug fixes

- Fixed hand getting stuck behind walls
- Cannons and mortars can be set off on the fort map to cause a distraction (light with flame)
- Pause menu button changed to left controller menu button
- Added snap turning setting
- Improved fall detection / fixed npcs randomly dying as you appraoch
- Fix boundary issues in the Encampment map
- Fix objectives occasionally not being marked as complete
